title: Structuring Complex Components with Conceptual Components
abstract: In this post I want to show a way to use Higher-Order Components with React Hooks in order to structure complex components. This method can be described as an architectural pattern to give hooks a straight forward way to use them in order to prevent developers from falling for the traps hooks do have.
meta-title: Structuring Complex Components with Conceptual Components
meta-description: A way to use Higher-Order Components with React Hooks to structure complex components. This can be described as an architectural pattern to give hooks a way to make them usable.
